price: E como atribuir-Lhe quem cresce entre adornos e não é argüente, na disputa?
arabic: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّؤُاْ فِي ٱلۡحِلۡيَةِ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡخِصَامِ غَيۡرُ مُبِينٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: awaman yunasha-u fī al-ḥil'yati wahuwa fī al-khiṣāmi ghayru mubīnin
